entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
